means: 咨询的，打听的，爱追根究底的
打听，询问( inquire的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: All this helps children to develop an inquiring attitude to learning.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有这些都有助于培养孩子好学爱问的态度。

sentence.Network_en: A man has been inquiring for you at the office.
sentence.Network_cn: 有个人在办公室一直等着要见你.

sentence.Network_en: The police are inquiring into the murder.
sentence.Network_cn: 警察正在调查这起谋杀案.

intergrated course ... 16. moreover 而且,再者 17. inquiring 好问的, 爱探索的 18. global 世界的, 全球的.
inquirer 调查人inquiring 咨询的inquiry 查究

list.abs: 《费城问询报》（Philadelphia Inquirer）：这部叙事电影，内容有点异想天开。 　　《华盛顿邮报》（Washington Post）：剧情试图推 …
寻_百度百科 ... 寻找[ look of;search;seek] 探究；研究；推求[ study;rearch;inquire into] 继续[ continue].
费城询问报（PHILADELPHIA INQUIRER）：最近在流行乐坛打开了一道裂缝…为一位带著鲜明旋律段落而来的女性创作歌手而开， …
after的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... ask after 问候 inquire after 问候 ever after 从此以后一直.
大学英语四级常用词组 ... inquire about 询问，打听 inquire after 问起(某人)的健康情况 inquire for 询问(商店、地点等).

entry.def: If you have an inquiring mind, you have a great interest in learning new things.

example.ex: I have always had an enquiring mind where food is concerned...
example.tran: 我在吃的方面一向很爱探究求索。

example.ex: All this helps children to develop an inquiring attitude to learning.
example.tran: 所有这些都有助于培养孩子好学爱问的态度。

entry.def: If someone has an inquiring expression on their face, they are showing that they want to know something.

auth_sentence.content: Only by asking & inquiring do you learn.
auth_sentence.res_content: Only by asking & inquiring do you learn.

auth_sentence.content: Get an open and scientific, inquiring mind.
